parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name>game1</name>=<value> arma3

</value></part><part><name>version1</name>=<value> 0.50

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation

</value></part><part><name>descr</name>=<value> Returns the string representation of unit as an four slots array.

</value></part><part><name>s1</name>=<value> [[getDescription]] unit

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>r1</name>=<value> [[Array]] of [[String]]s to format <tt>[unit'''Class''', uniform'''Name''', vest'''Name''', backpack'''Class''']</tt>

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[getDescription]] [[player]]; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>(UAV Operator)</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>returns ["B_soldier_UAV_F", "Combat Fatigues (MTP)", "Carrier Special Rig (Green)", "B_UAV_01_backpack_F"]</value></part></template></code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[getDescription]] [[objNull]]; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>returns ["ERROR", "ERROR", "ERROR", "ERROR"]</value></part></template></code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[roleDescription]], [[vehicleVarName]]
</value></part></template>

<dl class='command_description'>
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment>
<dt class="note">[[User:Druid|Druid]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
Return value fixed in revision 0.51.103185.

<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl></root>
